textPlain: The Air Canada example is not convincing because it is not too big to fail. Flight operators fail all the time. They don’t operate on high margins and work in highly competitive markets. If shitty customer service doesn’t hurt Air Canada it just means people don’t care that much about it to switch to another operator. So it’s working as intended.
A better question to ask is "What jobs can AI replace without a drop in the quality of the user experience?"Generating clip art is definitely one of them.Any others?
